summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Virginia Street, from Minor Avenue to Westlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and re-grading the same, and constructing wooden curbs and gutters, together with all necessary bulkheads, or retaining walls, and the readjustment and extension of the existing sewer system and water main system,. all in accordance with Resolution No. 171 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds"as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency", approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
